issue.title: [Packaging][APT] Use the "main" component for Ubuntu 19.10
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because we always use "main" component in apache-arrow-archive-keyring.
